column4: I'm updating /mozilla/ in Supertuxkart. I tried mv -u but that didn't really work.
what are you trying to achieve?
i see. I am not sure, how to do it properly, but moving the old directory out of the way (perhaps dirname.OLD) and then simply using cp -r should do the trick then.
I'll give it a shot. Thanks very much, I'll report back later.
